Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelView

Class PlayerPointsView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelView.PlayerPointsView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerPointsView extends Object implements Serializable
Immutable class that represents the single player with his scores

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerPointsView

      public PlayerPointsView(int[] commonGoalPoints, int adjacentPoints, String nickname)
      Constructs a PlayerPointsView.
      Parameters:
      commonGoalPoints - An array with the scores of common goals, where the position indicates the score relative to that common goal.
      adjacentPoints - The score of adjacent tiles.
      nickname - The nickname of the player.

  • Method Details

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets the sum of the common goal points and adjacent points.
      Returns:
      The total points of the player(without personal points).
